creator: rcoleman@criticalmagic.com
text:
When enabling both mod_include and mod_suexec, the simple server include
line <!--#exec cmd="ls" --> results in suexec exiting with the error
message "too few arguments".  This line executes ok if I recompile without
suexec support.

I modified my copy of suexec to see what is being passed to suexec
when a server side include line of the form

<!--#exec cmd="ls" --> is parsed.  It looks like NO arguments are being
passed, so suexec exists with "too few arguments".
creator: rcoleman@criticalmagic.com
colmmacc@redbrick.dcu.ie
text:
Created attachment 1896
This patch resolves the mod_include + mod_suexec problem
*** Bug 43771 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
